title: Data needs to drive conversations, not division
description: In the post‑pandemic news cycle, it became easy to treat charts as a kind of journalistic spell: visualize the data and legitimacy will follow. But the flood of partisan “stat dumps” has trained plenty of people to see numbers as just another weapon in a never-ending culture war. In 2026, the task for data journalism...
